sentences.en: Cannot wield is disconsolate, unceasing is temporarily the emotions.
sentences.cn: 挥不去的是惆怅 、 暂不断的是情思.

sentences.en: He decides to wield his pitiful weapon.
sentences.cn: 他决定动用他的可怜的武器了.

sentences.en: He remains chairman, but wields little power at the company.
sentences.cn: 他还是主席，但在公司内没有什么权力。

sentences.en: He was attacked by a man wielding a knife.
sentences.cn: 他遭到一名持刀男子的袭击。

sentences.en: He whispers to you through the blade you wield.
sentences.cn: 他在通过你所拿着的这把剑向你低语.

sentences.en: He who knows only how to wield a pen usually feels quite helpless in the face of practical problems.
sentences.cn: 光会耍笔杆的人,碰到实际问题往往束手无策.

sentences.en: I saw you wield scythe once.
sentences.cn: 我曾经见过你挥舞镰刀.

sentences.en: It is still the rich nations which wield the power.
sentences.cn: 现在操纵着大权的仍是那些富国.

sentences.en: Most Oni dress in tighter skins and wield clubs.
sentences.cn: 大部分鬼都长有硬皮,挥舞木棒.

sentences.en: Oni dress in tighter skins and wield huge swords and carry javelins.
sentences.cn: 鬼长有硬皮,挥舞巨大的刀剑并携带投枪.

sentences.en: She wields enormous power within the party.
sentences.cn: 她操纵着党内大权。

sentences.en: The Church wields immense power in Ireland.
sentences.cn: 在爱尔兰，教会操纵着大权。

sentences.en: The two firms wield enormous clout in financial markets.
sentences.cn: 两家公司在金融市场有非常大的影响力。

sentences.en: The two principal officeholders wield enormous power.
sentences.cn: 这两个主要官员掌握着巨大的权力.

sentences.en: They wield enormous political power.
sentences.cn: 他们行使巨大的政治权力.

sentences.en: They would rather be a hireling in this world than wield kingly power among the dead.
sentences.cn: 他们宁可在阳世为奴,也不愿在冥府为王.

sentences.en: Those under suspicion can also wield supreme power over their potential accusers, or be in charge of allocating funding to their projects or institutions.
sentences.cn: 那些被怀疑的人也会向那些潜在的指控者挥舞权力的大棒，或者掌管着为后者及其单位分配经费。

sentences.en: We ought to be thankful that it is the nice people who wield it.
sentences.cn: 我们应该感谢的是,发挥这种作用的正是这些正派人.

sentences.en: You wield an army, you hold a city, what next?
sentences.cn: 现在您手握重兵, 攻城拔寨, 下一步 呢 ?

sentences.en: ZHANG Xiao - Yu Wang and purple arrogance wield that distinction?
sentences.cn: 张筱雨与那个王紫骄有啥区别?

trans.tran_cn: 支配（权力等），使用（武器等）
trans.tran_en: to hold sth, ready to use it as a weapon or tool

trans.tran_cn: 支配， 掌权， 行使
trans.tran_en: If someone wields power, they have it and are able to use it
